website_summaries.verdict: Affordable alternative to higher-end models. Easy to clean and maintain.
pros: Can be washed/sanitized in washing machine
Comfortable surface does not hurt paws
Large area size and heavy duty construction
cons: Edges of mat tend to curl up vs. lie flat
Does not capture all litter, some tracking reported
Not designed well for urine/feces mistakes

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Here is a little trick that I learned. Put this mat in a corner. Put the litter box on the mat - also facing the corner. Instead of my cats walking out of the box and traipsing litter across the floor, they get out of the box walk toward the corner and by the time they walk around the box onto the floor - all of the litter is off their feet. So with the mat and just facing the box into the corner - my floor rarely has litter on it. The mat is easy to clean. I just hold it over the trash can and the litter just falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of cat mats to control litter spread, but the ones with little spikes that stick up don't do much. This design has little holes and the litter gets trapped in there so it doesn't spread it. It actually works. The pricepoint is very good, compared to some very expensive mats that get good reviews. But I'll stick with this one because it works and the price is very worth it. Will be getting two more for the other boxes in the house. It does take a little time for it to relax from being rolled up but if you put something heavy on the corners it will do so in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: JujubeMBA

customer_reviews.title: Mat Catches Everything
customer_reviews.text: Thing catches SO much litter. My cats step out and it seems to take all the litter off their paws. I don't have bunch of litter strewn about the litter box, it's all sitting in the mat. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a smaller Petlinks mat in the past, so I decided to order a larger one for a second litterbox. The mat I received is covered in some strange white splatter that can't be removed, and has a rubber-like chemical odor that is impossible to get rid of. I've tried washing this thing in the bath as well as the washing machine probably 4 times now and it still reeks. The worst of it is the odor clings to whatever the mat makes contact with (the cats, the carpet, even walking nearby). This does not seem normal and this cannot be healthy. I'm tossing it because I'm tired of this toxic odor infecting my entire house.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I thought this mat would help solve some issues I had with litter tracking all over the place. It's made well, I bought the biggest one but the way it's shipped (all rolled up) I could not for the life of me flatten it out. I tried everything to get it just to be somewhat straight and it just refused. Maybe I got a bad mat but I got two indoor/outdoor runner insead and it's works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter mat
customer_reviews.text: Best litter mat ever. I bought this in blue because it was the least expensive in the colors and it wouldn't be where anyone would see it. I cut it into halves for a narrow space. It shows clay litter dust because its a dark blue, but washes or mops off easily. I've bought 4 of these mats so far and I'm going to buy more. Cats don't chew and claw them,either. You can also vacuum over them.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz

customer_reviews.title: XL Not Quite Big Enough
customer_reviews.text: The XL is not quite big enough for 2 litter boxes. My cats jump out the sides of the boxes so the mat needs to extend far enough beyond the sides of the boxes. I lined up the XL and an old Medium size one and that seems to do the trick. I like that this mat is only one layer so litter cannot get stuck in it. My cats don't seem to mind the texture either.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Concept, lousy packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. It catches stuff and at the same time is easy to clean, as opposed to those woven things that you can never get all the old grains of smelly litter out of. The only downside is that it came so tightly rolled that I have never been able to get it to lay flat. I have tried leaving it in the sun, leaving it in the sun with flat weights on it, putting it in the dryer then flattening it. Nothing works. After 21⁄2 months you'd think it would have relaxed. I'm afraid I will just have to cut the end off, which sucks.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay unrolled
customer_reviews.text: The mat works decently if you can keep it flat, but it is shipped rolled up and the mat continues to roll back up no matter what I try. I've tried putting weights on the ends and taping it down to the floor, but it still rolls up. The company should think about shipping it differently in a box to prevent the mat from staying permanently curled up. I bought two mats and ended up replacing both with a more heavy duty rubber outdoor mat at Home Depot for only $13 that stays flat and works much better of getting the litter off our cat's paws to prevent tracking in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Marllie

customer_reviews.title: Useless, does not trap litter
customer_reviews.text: 100% useless, does not trap litter better than any other mat as litter still goes off the the mat. I guess it holds in some of it to shake it out but there is so much litter on the floor I usually dump it on the floor and sweep everything. Waste of money. S
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It looks like 2 pieces but it's actually 1 piece and think of the outside as a border or frame that's welded to the main piece on the underside. The indentations on the side you see are the protrusions on the other side. The mat reminds me of a thinner and smaller industrial type mat found in kitchen of restaurant or commercial establishment. It washes easily but sometimes needs to be soaked to get debris out of the holes. If I can do it over, 15 x 24 is too small and I would have bought something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Green Thumb

customer_reviews.title: Helps with cats who like to splash
customer_reviews.text: We've got a cat who enthusiastically enjoys trying to swim in his water bowl and loves getting water everywhere. (He might be a dog in disguise). I've tried everything from putting absorbent microsoft cloths underneath to silicone mats (the water just accumulates). With these water can get in the little circles and it doesn't evaporate but it also doesn't soak through so you can pick it up and just let the excess drip into the sink. The only thing that makes it a bit hard to use on the floor is that the edges on both sides curl up so you have to put something to weigh them down.
customer_reviews.author: OrganizeZweet

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully easy to use! Catches litter - small amounts or large then just fold up and dump back in box. No messing with two layers to clean in between and no more smelly rug from peeing outside the box- just rinse or wipe off. I wish I owned this years ago- buy it you won't be disappointed. I accidentally ordered the wrong size but very easy and fast to exchange. Cats were weary of the smell of it for a day, I suppose you could wash it first but didn't stop a cat from proceeding to scratch a huge pile of litter onto it the second day and I didn't have to use my handheld vacuum to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Catches litter pretty well, but arrived with a very strong chemical odor. Usually, this isn't a problem and soon wears off, but this is crazy strong. It seeped into rugs below it. I'd suggest soaking it in bleach water if you get one like this. *Soaked it in a bucket with table salt (we used to rub our hands with this to get onion and garlic smells off of our hands in culinary school) and bleach, and the smell is back to a more normal rubber smell. I'd suggest people who get a smelly one do the same.
customer_reviews.author: AkrBn

customer_reviews.title: These work great at trapping cat litter
customer_reviews.text: These work great at trapping cat litter. I have 3 cats and one of them who makes a huge mess around the cat box. So these are helping to control the loose litter.
customer_reviews.author: Sara G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as before...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in gray a few years ago. We still have it, still looks like new. Bought a second one, and despite the photo showing the light gray (like the one we have), the new one is a dark gray. It also feels flimsier, and curls up in the corners, which our original one didn't/doesn't do. Other than the curling, it still works okay for the most part (again, curling corners) but it rates only 3.5 stars compared to our older mat. The gray color is fine, just bummed it didn't match our other one, since they're used side-by-side.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but a little small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my cat continuously destroyed previous litter mats with scratching to cover her mess. We use the Breeze pellet litter system and previous mats wouldn't really cat the pellets well. They are easier to clean up, but are like Legos when you step on them. This mat catches the pellets and keeps them from rolling around our bathroom. My cat hasn't damaged it (yet) from scratching and I'm thinking the smaller size is keeping her from scratching on it as much (she covers more in the actual box now). It looks small with our box, but the size doesn't' seem to bother my cat and it seems to keep the room cleaner so I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: wildhorse

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This litter mat does NOT keep litter from scattering all over the place. Even worse, one of my cats finds the mat's rubbery irresistible . . . to pee on. I can say one good thing about this mat. It's easy to hose off. But really, if you need a litter mat, save your money and use an old throw rug or piece of carpet remnant. It will work just as well, probably better.
customer_reviews.author: maryann

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! CANNOT recommend.  Will not lay down flat after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: This pad does trap litter IF you can get the mat to lay down flat. I bought the same product 2 years ago and was happy with it, but there has been a HUGE decline in the quality. I cannot recommend this item. I called customer service and the rep suggested placing heavy books on them [already tried that]. I should have returned them at that point. After 5 months of constantly curling up, they are going into the trash! Luckily I did not encounter the chemical smell like some others posted. I am getting new Fresh Kitty Jumbo Foam Chevron Cat Litter Mats! They are a LOT cheaper too!
customer_reviews.author: Mo in So Fl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love! I have a Maine Coon cat, so this bog cat makes big messes. Cat litter just gets everywhere & other cat litter mats I’ve bought were kinda a pain to use & kinda gross honestly. I bought 2 of these in large and placed them under her litter box and it covers the floor all around it. It catches a ton of litter and is super easy to clean, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Arrived looking dirty. Not sure if it was used before or if that's just from the manufacturing process, but I put cleaning solution on them and hosed them off and they still have a weird film like substance on them. They work ok, no better or worse than the other litter mat I have tried so far, and mostly my cat just jumps over it, so it's hard to say how well it works for sure. They do hold water well, so when my cat peed on it twice, it was super easy cleanup. I probably should've just returned them due to the strange film on them from the start, but I was feeling lazy.
customer_reviews.author: SGJCR

customer_reviews.title: Horrifyingly bad smell. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot begin to describe how horribly this mat smells. Like a horrible rubber plastic synthetic smell that stunk up our whole house within two minutes of opening it. I literally had to take it outside. When you stand within 3 feet of it you can smell it. Even my husband thought it was bad and he has basically no sense of smell. Honestly, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 100 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous litter mats because one of my cats regularly pees over the end of the box. She has more real estate than a labrador so I kinda think she does it out of spite 🙂. This mat deserves 100 stars! Soooooo easy to clean and doesn't retain any pee odor. I'm so happy with this product and really appreciate that it was reasonably priced. Finally, something that works! Its silicone so I'm buying another one to catch drips from my BBQ to protect my deck, way less expensive than the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Tigger10

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: First, it's very small. Which is fine for smaller cats maybe but definitely not a large Maine Coon, second...if your cat decides to potty on it...you will never, and I mean EVER get the smell out. Bleach, vinegar, baking soda, toilet cleaner, doesn't matter. Absorbs order like crazy, had to throw it away. Very flimsy and floppy, makes it harder to pickup to actually dump the litter off. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Gealach

customer_reviews.title: like most cats
customer_reviews.text: GET IT! I am practically phobic of stepping on litter, I always have been. Well, like most cats, my kitty is a big ole jerk who loves digging unnecessarily long and flinging litter as passionately as possible. This would put litter all over the room and its not like I have the time to be constantly sweeping in there. since we got the mat litter hasnt got past it. We only have 1 lil fur baby. If you have more than 1 I reccommend getting another one. Out baby is relatively clean so he doesnt get poop or pee on the mat so i cant tell you about cleaning that up off it but litter shakes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Sunryder

customer_reviews.title: Too bad I just missed the return window
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to give it a chance. It won't lay down all the way. It does seem to do a decent job at trapping litter. I use the okocat litter that comes in the blue box so it is tiny piece of pellets. It still doesn't keep the litter from making it to my living room despite it being part of 5 feet of various litter mats. I just tripped over it again and I discovered it can't go where a door will open or close over it. If I had moved it sooner I would have discovered that and been able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great solid and sturdy mat! Catches all of the stray litter!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than expected for a "medium" but turns out to be the perfect size for one cat box as long as you aren't planning to put any part of it under the box. It catches stray litter very well and holds it until you empty it. My kitties chew up any mat I put down (weird and I don't know why) but they both tried it one time on this one and decided it wasn't worth the effort because it is very well made, solid and sturdy. I would absolutely recommend this litter mat!
customer_reviews.author: Miche33

customer_reviews.title: Soooo much better than those noodle mats I was using
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much better than those noodle mats I was using. It's much easier to clean. I generally clean my mats once a week and this one I dont have to beat senseless to get the litter out of. Tracking is nonexistent and it fits perfectly for the area I keep my box. I do use a lidded litter box and the mat fits perfectly and expands out far enough that my kitties paws are clean by the time they are off it. Need to order a second one for my other box. Recommend getting an XL for optimal area coverage.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats that miss the box
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth or fifth of these mats. I have an older cat who manages to miss the box (despite all efforts to get bigger boxes, higher sides, etc.). This mat is leak proof and catches liquids, as well as litter, really well. Good colors for my home too. The only reason I keep replacing them is because after several misses by the cat (and another cat that gets a bit too excited about litterbox messes), a fresh mat makes sense. Will keep buying over and over
customer_reviews.author: JuliR

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a couple of years ago and really liked it. Just got another cat so needed another one for the 2nd litter box. I was very disappointed that the quality is not what it had been. This one is very much thinner and does not seem as sturdy. Guessing it will still do the job but gave a 3 instead of 5 because of disappointment in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Has a curled end that won’t flatten out
customer_reviews.text: This mat comes rolled. After unrolling it, one end stayed curled. I have had it for two months now and I can’t get one end to flatten out. I’ve tried everything. I have never had a rug or mat before that I couldn’t get to flatten out eventually. I’ve tried all my trusty methods such and carpet tape and laying it in the sun (the heat usually works on rubber mats). No success. It’s just as curled as the day I unrolled it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Best Litter Mat on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat, and have just purchased a second one to give to my sister for her cats. The flexible rubber makes it 'soft on the paws' so the cats readily step on it. It also has a suction cup style base, so that it doesn't slide, and the shallow surface holes pick up all of the wayward litter that would normally end up on my floors. So easy to clean too -- just roll it up and shake into the trash container.
customer_reviews.author: Lory

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have one exactly like this. And it is more sturdy. I can fold it to dump litter back into the box or the trash bin. The one I purchased through Amazon is flimsy. The ends fold in on each other. It’s very difficult to “fold” to dump litter into the trash can or the litter box. I’ll keep it for now, but will look for better options.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great floor protector
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these mats. One for the bathroom and one for my bedroom. I ordered these mats because I have been tired of vacuuming after every litter box use. These mats not only catch the cat litter when exiting the litter box but are really easy to clean. To clean them, I just spray them with Clorox bleach cleaner and then hose them off in the shower. My only complaint is when they arrived they smelt heavily of chemicals and had a heavy latex slippery feel to them. I would recommend cleaning the product before use.
customer_reviews.author: Green Thumb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It seems that NO mat that claims to stop or greatly reduce litter tracking does the job. This one is no exception, but I haven't had it very long. I can say that at least it's easy to clean up the litter that gets dumped on it whenever a cat exits the box. You can see the litter and easily vacuum it up, or dump it off. I thought it would be a little larger, but it's still a very good size. Much better than my old litter mat.
customer_reviews.author: cbb

customer_reviews.title: Different colors yield different results.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these mats in different colors, ordered at different times. We really loved the first one (gray). Easy to clean, catches litter well, cats didn't try to eat it, attractive. The second one, in a different color that we ordered a few months later (tan), is made of a completely different material and STILL hasn't completely laid flat after 8+ months. The first mat did take a while to completely uncurl, but was great once it did. The second one has STILL got some curve in the corners despite our best efforts, and is made of a thinner, floppier plastic. Would be a 5 star product if not for the inconsistencies.
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a good size, catches litter the cat throws out on it. But I agree with a reviewer who said the mat has a sticky residue! It also has a strong rubber or chemical smell that hasn't completely aired out in over a week. Would be great if it didn't have the residue and smell. Made in China of course, everything is now. They have so many dangerous products that you wonder if this is safe.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: Really effective
customer_reviews.text: This really works wonders. We have an unfinished basement and the placement of the cat litter and cat food is near by the central drain in the floor. The cat leaves a lot of litter and kibble on the floor that I have to sweep regularly to keep it from getting into the drain and this mat manages to catch all of it! Now all I have to do is pick up the mat and shake it into the trash can once a week instead of sweeping daily.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Fields Creative

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty good. It doesn't eliminate scattered litter for us because our cats jump out of the litter box like spazoids. But, it has definitely helped keep the mess to a minimum. We got the XL size and it works great for our XL litter box. We put the mat out more towards the front of the box for extra protection and that helps. Others mentioned a rubbery smell. The mat is rubber so it did have a smell right out of the box but that dissipated quickly. Litter shakes out of holes very easily. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unusable quality. The mat has this sticky residue all ...
customer_reviews.text: Unusable quality. The mat has this sticky residue all over the place and you can't even wash it off with water well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacey

customer_reviews.title: Would write more but two of the cats are fighting over something stupid..
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 indoor cats and these mats have saved me lots of cleaning/sweeping up bits of kitty litter. With 6 litter boxes I ordered 8 of these pads as I seem to always have one or two that have more that just kitty litter on them (one kitty is very sick and is at home/hospice). I would have given this product a 5 star EXCEPT the way it's delivered is in a round box. Takes FOREVER to get that crimp out of the rubber mat. I wish they had a way to deliver in a flat box. Would write more but two of the cats are fighting over something stupid......
customer_reviews.author: John W Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Better than the alternative, but still a lot of work.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was hoping when I bought these mats. I put them in a large walk in, carpeted closet that has TWO large catboxes. I was trying to fix the issue of cat litter being tracked out of the closet, but the truth is I have to clean these off just as often as I had to vacuum the carpet before. I don't think its a downfall of the product, I just have some messy-ass cats.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Basically just a mat. Doesn’t really seem to help clearing all the litter off my cats feet. It works to an extent, but not nearly as well as I had hoped UPDATE: Lowered my review to 2 stars. Really disappointed with this mat. It essentially does nothing. I have the very small granule cat litter so maybe that’s why, but I’m looking to buy another alternative at this point
customer_reviews.author: Tony DiGiorgio

customer_reviews.title: Petlinks
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these mats, one in the medium size and two in the XL size. They are great at trapping litter and dust on the mat so it doesn’t get tracked out of the box as badly. I have two litter boxes in a spare bedroom and the cats were flicking litter all over the room before I got the XL mats. It is so big the cats can’t jump over it when they get out of the box. They don’t mind the feel of the mat which I have found to be a problem with other types of mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more stray litter, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months and bought a 2nd one for 2nd litter box. It works great with the Tidy Cat Breeze litter box system we have. The larger holes designed to capture stray litter are perfect for the larger litter pellets. It would probably work just as well for normal litter. I use the Kids 'n' Pets spray on any accidents, let it soak for 10 mins and spray off with a hose. No scrubbing involved. Super easy clean up. So far, no damage from claws from one OCD cat that really wants to scratch every nearby surface for "extra coverage". Really good value that completes the best litter box system I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for catching litter and is water resistant for any little accidents. It's is a decent size and has held up to my cats - even when they scratch at the mat. My only complaint is that it is difficult to clean when it gets wet and there is litter on it. The litter clumps up into the holes and takes more than a quick rinse in the shower to remove. The mat works perfectly for normal litter and I've only experienced problems when one of my cats pee on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A cat owner must have!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great to have if your cat enjoys getting litter all over the place! I really like this material as it's more durable against the claws and is easy to clean. If you have the space I would highly recommend getting the Large just so you have more surface area around your litter box! These have been so helpful with catching litter and now having it all over our hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Best kind of litter mat available
customer_reviews.text: Best kind of litter mat available IMO. Why? Because unlike other carpet like mats, the mess you've collected on the mat can actually be dealt with cleanly, effectively, and swiftly by folding the mat in half and sifting all the loose litter in the middle, then either dumping it back in the box or trash. Other types of mats will only trap the loose litter but difficult to clean thoroughly, or act as a placemat but not actually keeping litter ON the mat. This thing is awesome. Got the XL size to go with my 2 Litter Robot open airs. My five kitties are stoked.
customer_reviews.author: KittyKuts

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean.
customer_reviews.text: 2 Big Flaws. First the mat came in a tight roll, and seems like it was rolled up before the material was not fully cured in production because there is a permanent curl at one end. Even after 6 months it is still there. Second,- It does do a decent job of catching the litter, but it is impossible to clean. The mat is made up of little deep cups that have tight corners. I have tried soaking the whole mat in soapy water and scrubbing it with a brush, but just cannot get all the little cups cleaned. I am finally giving up and will be purchasing a different mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shimizu

customer_reviews.title: Ends keep curling up; not laying flat
customer_reviews.text: First off, the second one we ordered is not the same color tan as the first. Not even close. OK, that fine. However, this was rolled up too quickly after being pulled from the mould, and the ends want to curl up; not good. We have put weights on them for weeks and it didn't affect it at all. The first one was perfect without issue, but the seller must have changed vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Ron N.

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was silicone
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to work well and hold up well. I've had it over a month. It stinks. It's better now as long as I don't leave it in the sun after cleaning it. I wish I could find one like it that was made out of silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Durable. The large size is a little bit wider than a standard litter box, so you can slip one edge just under the box and leave a wide mat area to collect litter leavings. My cat has decided this is the best place to deposit hairballs, which is both helpful and annoying. It's easy to clean thoroughly in the bathtub with bleach or spray cleaner and hot water. The patterned texture is hard to spot-clean with paper towel, so that's a bit of a trade-off. If it's just litter then you can fold it over and pour it back into the box without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: it wasn't easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: my cat decided to use it as a sub for the litter box. with that said, it wasn't easy to clean. if it was just the litter this may have been a better match for us. my cat is often messy and just jumps over the mat so rocks go everywhere anyways. nice try though.
customer_reviews.author: LeighLP

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a cat that like to jump and kick out when all done doing his business then look no farther. Honestly there’s no mat that will help with that! But this mat is by far the best when it comes to keeping cat litter from being scattered all over the floor. Every couple day just empty it back into the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: TheBookCollector

customer_reviews.title: Very, very thin
customer_reviews.text: I expected from the photos that this pad would have some weight to it and keep its shape when it was unfolded. It doesn't; the edges keep curling and the pad is SO thin. It's definitely rubber and does a decent job catching overflow from my cat's food bowl, but I don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: won't lie flat- so what is the point?
customer_reviews.text: The mat is rolled so tightly in shipping that one end is permanently curled-- I tried weighing it down with books and then even tried to velcro and tape it to the floor, but nothing worked. This means, litter gets around and under the mat and is even more annoying to clean than if the mat were not there. It's also pretty ugly. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Less litter means less sweeping
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sizes of these and they seem to work well, better than what I had before. The only problem is they stay curled on the edges and I've not been able to get them to go down even waiting them. I saw somebody suggest putting on the dryer so I'm going to try that. Seems like a simple fix, couldn't the manufacture just rolled in the opposite direction? That means when I enrolled them they would be flat. Think about it?
customer_reviews.author: Khakijo

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This mat gets the job done. It holds in about 80-90% of the litter my cats throw out. Most mats I’ve tried hold the same percentage, but I like how easy this mat is to clean compared to others. It was also very affordable and I didn’t notice any weird smells from it, just a normal new rubber smell that wore off after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this mat! I have tried countless mats with no success. We only have one cat but he loves to drag litter all over the place. We keep his enclosed litter box in the laundry room and before this mat we’d have litter all the way down the hall. Now its rare if I find any. This mat collects probably 98% of the litter that be brings out. This mat is definitely a lifesaver for this clean freak!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dykstra

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Material.  Stops liquids.  Decent.
customer_reviews.text: This does OK as a litter mat. It definitely collects litter and cuts down on the amount in the carpet. However, it's a much thicker and heavier material than others and it just isn't as easy to slide it around where you need it. It also curls a little on the ends which can be problematic. It is good for trapping liquids if your cat happened to see on it. It is easy to wash as well. I'd recommend one of the "black hole" style mats over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Agostini

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This litter mat is very thick and easy to vacuum clean. So much easier than the one I used previously that had what looked like rubber threads on top to catch the sand. It was very hard to get all the sand out rather shaking ot vacuuming it. This design is soo much better. Cant attest to longevity, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: inCatnito

customer_reviews.title: Mat not made as well as older versions
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years but haven't needed a new one for several years. They sure have changed. They look the same but now are half as thick and durable as previous mats. Sad it seems literally everything is getting more expensive and poorly made. I expect this new flimsy one will rip easily and last maybe a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased many different mats that really did not catch litter. I have a little digger and always had litter on floor. This mat is the best I have found and really helps keep litter off the floor. I just shake it back into the litter box, have washed it with lysol no bleach and keeps it cleans and no odor.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: They are far better than the 'yoga mat' ones that are on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these mats so far. They are far better than the 'yoga mat' ones that are on Amazon. The cats are not interested in scratching these ones like they do to the others. This mat is heavy rubber and none of mine had a smell. Getting the label off just took 5 seconds and a pair of scissors. If the edge is curled put something heavy on it for a day and it will straighten out. I also like how these are non porous, so if you don't notice a mess right away it will not leak through like the other ones allow.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan F.

customer_reviews.title: Litter free floors
customer_reviews.text: I have always had litter scattered across the bathroom floor, but the new cat seemed to take it as a challenge to scatter as much as possible. This, of course, led to a rivalry between my cats. Faced with sweeping litter several times a day, I decided to try this mat. It works! I have found that it works best when the litter box faces a wall or is angled to face a corner so the cats have to walk on the mat. I have hardly any litter on the floor now, and I just shake the mat into the litter box daily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Catches most of the spill
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it's supposed to. Catches that small amount of litter that gets stuck on the cat's paws as it gets out of the litter box. One side of the mat that I got was a bit curled under as though it had not had enough time to flatten out after manufacture. But not a big deal. Does not slip around on the floor too easily so stays pretty much put with the cats getting in and out of the litter box. Would recommend it to cat owners.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Artemyeff

customer_reviews.title: Litter, Litter everywhere.....no more!
customer_reviews.text: I have two litter boxes in the same room (facing each other at a right angle.) I bought the larger mat and put it in between them. Once or twice a week I fold it the mat (it's very flexible) and shake the litter out in the garbage. Love it. I've been struggling with the issue for years. The mat also washes nicely. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia553

customer_reviews.title: IDEAL
customer_reviews.text: I have my litterbox on top of the carpet and this is so great. I do wish it was a bit bigger because litter gets kicked further than it. But I love how easy it is to clean. IT catches so much and I can just pick it up and dump it out. My cats that love to chew have not been able to destroy it at all and its been about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: samanthann92

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a GRAY mat and this one looks like a Charcoal color
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the way the mat catches the litter. And my cats are not afraid to walk on it, as they have been in the past on other litter mats. However, I ordered a GRAY mat and this one looks like a Charcoal color... almost Black. The picture looks like a true steel gray color, which is what I wanted to match my bathroom. I didn't want to send it back because it is doing a great job for me. So, I guess I'll have to learn to live with the color.
customer_reviews.author: sheila a. smith

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough for us
customer_reviews.text: These mats lasted 2 days in our house. I liked the way they had gripped the hardwood floors, but my savage cats had them torn up in the blink of an eye. They arrived quick, and they were rolled up, so the end didn’t lie flat, and they never had a chance to unravel before my cats chewed and scratched them to pieces. They aren’t durable enough for savage beasts.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell W

customer_reviews.title: Functional but didn't quite work out
customer_reviews.text: Funtionally it works well. We keep it right by the litter box. It catches a good amount of the litter from the paws. Unfortunately, shortly after we starting using it the pat starting have a chemical type smell and the cats started to use the mat to pee on instead of the box. I have washed it several times using different cleaners including bleach, laundry detergent, dish soap and vinegar and baking soda. It works well for a couple days then the mat starts to smell and they pee on it.
customer_reviews.author: evan nash

customer_reviews.title: Great litter mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litter mat we have ever used. We have tried pretty much every other litter mat out there and they all fail to keep the litter on the mat and allow it to get tracked everywhere. This litter mat is awesome. It really does keep the litter in the little holes, and very very little gets onto my floor. I was actually quite surprised that it worked the way it was advertised since none of the others I've had ever really work. I would definitely recommend this litter mat. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works like you'd hope it would; not 100% effective, but miles better than before
customer_reviews.text: Works like you'd hope it would. I'm surprised how effectively the holes suck the litter out of your cat's paws. I can look at the distribution of litter on the mat, spreading out away from the litter box, and tell that most of it comes off before she reaches the other side. Nothing's 100% effective, but it's miles better than it was before.
customer_reviews.author: T. Blikstad

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buyer with Multiple Boxes
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Purr-FECT Paws mat and I’m still just as happy with the products. They do a great job of catching paw litter as well as the litter my cats kick out of their boxes. I will move the boxes, roll up the mat like a taco, and pour the litter back in the boxes about once every two weeks. The mats are also super easy to wash with a hose when they do get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lieby

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this item. My cat was dragging litter all-over in his paws and other mats caught some of it, but not much. This mat actually spreads their paws when they step on it and the litter drops through the holes on the mat (it's kind of two layers - the holes and the catching part). Get this and you won't have cat litter everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Paula McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Catches Litter Well
customer_reviews.text: I have the large mat and I keep it under my cats' litter box. It does a good job catching the litter they kick out when burying their "business' and when they hop out of the litter box. It's pretty flimsy as in it's not a stiff piece of plastic. The plastic is thick enough though and will last a long time (difficult for it to rip apart)
customer_reviews.author: xtinaatx

customer_reviews.title: The best litter mat!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many litter mat it is not funny anymore. I bought the Petfusion smartgrip and it was awful. It didn't stop the tracking, it was flimsy, and when the cats had an accident I was grateful because it gave me a reason to throw it away. I have bought the Aspen Stay Fresh Cat Litter Mat with Scatter Control from Walmart and it works, but it is really hard to vacuum. Finally I tried this one and I feel like I have found the final solution. I like this litter mat so much that I have three of them for the three litter boxes. It catches the litter, is easy to vacuum, and it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more cat litter on my floor
customer_reviews.text: At first i didn't need a mat because a brought a new litter box with a door, obviously i thought the door would hold up like the old one did, no not strong enough to withstand abuse, so my ghetto cat keeps smacking the door off and cat litter flies so i needed a mat that also wouldn't move like the old mat did
customer_reviews.author: PatrishaPhilly43

customer_reviews.title: Catches Most of Litter
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten a bigger one for long term use, but in our move I didn't know what we were going to land on for littler box placement. The price is excellent. It catches all the litter thrown on it (just not what she throws past it). Quick and easy to clean up! No vacuum necessary.
customer_reviews.author: April Mae

customer_reviews.title: Best litter mat EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 cats and always have a problem with litter going everywhere. I have tried so many litter mats with each one having many faults. This new mat has cut down significantly on litter tracking. I love how easy it is to just pick up the mat and pour the litter back into the box. I now have 2 of the X Large mats and 3 of the medium mats. I have recommended these to many people.
customer_reviews.author: Annliz

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: Paired it with a litter box hideaway and it catches all of the litter! Obviously it's not perfect but it works wonders. I plan to use my small hand vacuum to remove the litter. WARNING: the price on this item ranges and changes frequently. Make sure to watch it and buy when the product is between 20 and 23$. I paid $28 and two hours later it was down to $23. The lowest it had been was $20. Amazon does not refund for price changes.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product would definitely recommend. Pros: It is a very thick rubber, very sturdy yet flexible; seems like it will last a long time. It seems to catch a lot of litter, not perfect but does work. (Why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars.) My cat doesn't mind walking across it. Very heavy, won't curl up or be pushed away. Very easy to clean. The dry little can be shaken off and the whole thing can be easily hosed off and dried which is super nice. Cons: The mat must be aired out when first opened as it has a very pungent rubber smell, although it goes away after a few hours of airing out.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mat a few weeks and so far I really like it. I also have a covered litter box and this mat is right in front of it. Our kitty still gets some spilled off the mat as she jumps out of the box. The mat is a soft, pliable rubber so it can be easily rinsed off, but the rubber is heavy enough so the beveled edge stays down while trying to sweep on spilled litter from the floor.
customer_reviews.author: shannonO

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.  Makes more of a mess. :(  THROWING OUT.
customer_reviews.text: Really bad purchase. Makes more of a mess than having a carpet under pan. More litter upstairs than ever and impossible to clean. Throwing out.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: This mat really does capture the kitty litter from the cat's feet. I am amazed at how much litter it accumulates in just a few days, and I can't imagine how messy the floor would be without it! I am too lazy to lift the mat and shake the litter back into the litter pan, so I just vacuum the mat every few days. The cat and my family are both happy with this mat!
customer_reviews.author: P. Kurt

customer_reviews.title: If you have mulitple cats you must have this.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it catch the litter, bu t it makes it easy to recycle it back into the litter box. If you have a cat that is a 'snow blower', you know how much of a mess and how much waste of litter they can cause. This has been a mess saver and a money saver for me. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: NhewytTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Ends curl up and nothing will get it to lay down flat but it does work well.
customer_reviews.text: They work well in having much less cat litter tracked beyond the litter box HOWEVER I have yet to get anything to keep the curled up end on both mats to lay down flat. Nothing sticks to it and heavy weight for over a week has yet to work. You trip over it and it catches the vacuum and the cats want to play with the curled up end on each. Seller - any tips?? Will gladly change to a 5 star if you know something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - Flawed
customer_reviews.text: In the manufacturer photos, you see how the center channel grooves have a stopping point at the end? The one I received does not. What does that mean? Urine is not contained in the pad and flows right onto the floor (see photo). Duh. An engineer at the factory probably changed the die and didn't realize this error. Makes the product useless what we bought it for. Save your money and get one that can contain liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Momma

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mat—it's sturdy and thick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat—it's sturdy and thick, it traps the litter better than any other mat we've owned, and the cats aren't able to scratch the material. This size is probably good for a smaller litter box for one cat. We have two cats and an extra large litter box, so I should have bought the large version. Nevertheless, it's still the best mat we've used before.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: No More Litter Tracking!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat does exactly what it says -- litter tracking has been reduced to absolute minimum and I couldn't be happier! We have an extra large litter box and this mat fits it perfectly. When it's time to clean it I just roll it up a bit and empty it in the garbage. Soooooo much better than the obsessive vacuuming only to have the pellets fall back on the carpet when I turned off the vacuum... I sure don't miss those days! Only con is I'm sorry I didn't find this product sooner ;))
customer_reviews.author: NessaMia

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: i wasnt too sure about this product when i opened it up, but boy was I wrong!! this is so amazing it really does catch a ton more litter then i thought it would. thank you and thanks for the quick delivery. i waited to write this to see how it lasted/weathered up to 4 cats. AMAZING!!! : )
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Medium size – doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: To be clear, this review is for the 'medium' size. It fell short of expectations given all the positive reviews. I would guess it's because the medium size is so small and we have a full size cat, but it just doesn't work well. I would suggest getting two to pair together or get a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Glen H

customer_reviews.title: Protects floor and contains some of the litter mess
customer_reviews.text: The pads are delivered rolled into a tube shape. When unrolled, they do not always lay flat, even when extra weight is applied to the edges. I ordered 4 pads and have 3 litter boxes on them. The pads help with containing some of the litter, but not all of it. I vacuum the pads daily. If necessary, they can be washed with soap and water. It looks like they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: RAZ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This mat catches the litter just fine and it's very easy to clean because the litter won't stick to it and just sits in the holes instead. I do recommend getting a big one just because my cat jumps out sideways onto the floor instead of onto the mat so there's still a little that gets on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps litter out of the rest of the house
customer_reviews.text: We were having issues with our cats tracking litter from the litter box area into the rest of the house. We put one of these cat litter mats just inside of the door of the room where the litter boxes are located to help clean their feet before they leave the room. The mat has almost completely stopped litter from being tracked out of the litter box area.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fertenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good size, limits tracking, and gentle on paws
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat with Nature's Miracle high-sided litter box. The large size of this mat is large enough to contain scattered litter. It doesn't have sharp edges like some other mats, so the cats actually step on it, rather than avoiding it and taking the litter with them. I mistakenly had it upside-down (bumps rather than craters) for a long time. It still limited tracking, but to a lesser extent than it does now that I have flipped it. The craters catch more litter. Cleaning is easy because the mat doesn't have any fine crevices.
customer_reviews.author: IsThisRealLife?

customer_reviews.title: ogod are these nice!
customer_reviews.text: originally got because - a. we needed something, anything 2. add-on price was insane they are perfect size - large enough but not too big - and do a great job of catching, and is easy enough to roll in half and empty back into litterbox. now I just wish I had bought more, the current price is ok but the add-on price was much nicer lol
customer_reviews.author: Henzo Broquee

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: This mat seems to be decent quality but unfortunately it had quite a strong chemical smell. It seems as though there are two listings for this product - one indicates it is 100% silicone but the other doesn't say anything about what it is made out of. I bought it hoping it was silicone since that tends to be better with odors. There is nothing on the actual label indicating the materials it is made out of so I'm not if the silicone listing is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Totally reeks of rubber, leaves circle marks on surfaces, and ... our cats peed on them (first time ever having naughty box problems). Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Euge and Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good under Breeze boxes
customer_reviews.text: The X-Large is perfect for 2 Breeze boxes (they're jumbo). Mat arrived tightly curled but relaxed itself in a couple of days. Also appeared to be lightly powdered to keep it from sticking together, no problem. Cats accepted it. I took a star off only because the color is a much darker blue than shown. Note: The X-Large is big and heavy, so I expect I'll be hosing it off in the driveway rather than wrestling it into the washer. Worth the effort, as my cats are the hang-your-butt-over-the-side type.
customer_reviews.author: AZ ReaderTop Contributor: Cooking

product_meta.title: Petlinks Purr-FECT Paws Cat Litter Mat
product_meta.description: Color:Gray| Size:X-LargeThe best way to control litter scatter is to stop it before it starts. With a patented design that effectively removes and captures litter from cat paws, Petlinks Purr-fect Paws litter mats are a flexible, easy clean solution. The extra large mat measures 36 by 27 Inch making it a great choice for multi-cat litter boxes and large cats. Petlinks is known for innovative, solution-based and environmentally responsible products that fulfill all of your pet's needs - from play and interaction to rest and privacy and more. A member of the Worldwise family of pet products, Petlinks is grounded in the principles of pet safety, customer satisfaction and environmental responsibility. Petlinks products are designed to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards. They are then tested against those standards to ensure they meet our strict quality and safety requirements – ensuring they're safe for all members of your family. Petlinks offers a complete satisfaction guarantee. If a customer is dissatisfied with a Petlinks product for any reason, they will replace it or refund it - no questions asked. Since 1990, Worldwise and its brands have been committed to using environmentally responsible materials in its products. Whenever possible, Petlinks products are made with recycled, reclaimed, organic and sustainable materials.
feature_bullets: Flexible, easy to clean, scatter-reducing litter mat
Patented design effectively removes and captures litter from paws before they reach the floor
Designed to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards; 100 percent customer satisfaction guarantee from Petlinks

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
